original_title: Art Of Noise - Into Vision: The Complete Compendium
overview: Filmed live during 1999 and 2000 in Chicago and at the Coachella Festival, as well as 2 specially staged concerts in Shepherds Bush and Wembley in London. Original members Trevor Horn, Paul Morley and Anne Dudley were joined by Lol Creme in performances from the band's extensive repertoire.
title: Art Of Noise - Into Vision: The Complete Compendium
